mapper.sql: a.id AS "id", a.comment AS "comment", a.aspect AS "aspect", a.keypart AS "keypart", a.label AS "label", a.class AS "classe"
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO souce_data_result( id, comment, aspect, keypart, label, class ) VALUES ( #{id}, #{comment}, #{aspect}, #{keypart}, #{label}, #{classe} )
mapper.update: UPDATE souce_data_result SET comment = #{comment}, aspect = #{aspect}, keypart = #{keypart}, label = #{label}, class = #{classe} WHERE id = #{id}
mapper.select: select distinct class as classe from souce_data t1 inner join souce_data_result t2 where t1.id=t2.id and t2.aspect=#{aspect} ORDER BY t2.class
